title: Zain Fathoni - Senior Software Engineer at BookThatApp
description: I'm Zain, a developer living in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. I used to live in Singapore for 6 years during my tenure in Ninja Van. I love spending my spare time building user-centric products and giving talks in meetups and conferences. Besides sharing my open-source activities, I co-organize ReactJS Indonesia and Frontend Indonesia communities to help my fellow Indonesian developers learn.
